column2: "Na Israelmba no yɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do: na EWURADZE dze hɔn hyɛɛ Midianfo nsa mfe esuon."
"Na Midian ne nsa daa Israel do: na osian Midian ntsi Israelmba no yɛɛ etu wɔ mbepɔw mu
column3: na abo etu
column4: na guansumabew maa hɔnho."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: sɛ Israel dua a
column4: nna Midianfo
column5: na Amalekfo
column6: na boka afamu mba no afow aba hɔn do;"

column2: "na wɔbɛkyer hɔn do nsera
column3: na wɔsɛɛ asaase no do ndɔbaa
column4: dze kodu Gaza
column5: na wonngyaa akɔhomabɔdze biara

column2: "Na wɔdze hɔn fiembowa na hɔn asesee bae
column3: wɔba dɛ mbɛbɛw wɔ ɔdodow mu; hɔn na hɔn efumpɔnkɔ nyina wobu ano a ɔnnyɛ yie: na wɔbaa asaase no do dɛ wɔrebɛsɛɛ no."

column2: "Na osian Midian ntsi wɔbrɛɛ Israel adze dodoodow; na Israelmba no sui frɛɛ EWURADZE."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a osian Midian ntsi ma Israelmba no sui frɛɛ EWURADZE no
column5: "EWURADZE somaa nkɔnhyɛnyi bi wɔ Israelmba no hɔ: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column9: Emi na medze hom fi Egypt bae
column10: na miyii hom fii nkowaasom fi mu no;"

column2: "na megyee hom fii Egyptfo nsamu
column3: na hɔn a wɔhaaw hom nyinara nsamu
column4: na mutuu hɔn fii hom enyim
column5: na medze hɔn asaase maa hom;"

column2: "na mesee hom dɛ
column3: Emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn; mma hom nnsom Amorifo a hom tse hɔn asaase do no hɔn enyame: naaso hom enntsie me ndze."

column2: "Na EWURADZE no bɔfoe no bae
column3: na ɔbɛtsenaa osudur a ɔwɔ Ofra a ɔyɛ Abiezernyi Joas dze no n’ase: nna ne babanyin Gideon roporow ewu wɔ nsatwer no mu
column4: na ɔdze rusuma Midianfo no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE no bɔfoe no yii noho kyerɛɛ no
column3: na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: EWURADZE dzi w’ekyir
column5: ɔwo ɔbarimba a eyɛ ndam."

column2: "Na Gideon see no dɛ
column3: Ao mo wura
column4: sɛ EWURADZE dzi hɛn ekyir a
column5: nkyɛ ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na iyi nyinara aba hɛn do yi? Na hen na n’anwanwa dwuma nyinara a hɛn egyanom kaa hɛn ho asɛm dɛ
column6: Ana nnyɛ Egypt na EWURADZE yii hɛn fii bae no
column7: wɔ? Na afei EWURADZE atow hɛn akyen
column8: na ɔdze hɛn ahyɛ Midian nsa."

column2: "Na EWURADZE hwɛɛ no
column3: na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: Kɔ no w’abanyinndam yi ara mu
column5: na kɛgye Israel fi Midian nsamu. Ɔsoma na masoma wo?"

column2: "Na Gideon bisaa no dɛ
column3: Ao EWURADZE
column4: Ebɛnadze na medze bɛgye Israel nkwa? Hwɛ
column5: m’ebusua na ɔyɛ mbɔbɔr dodow wɔ Manaasɛ mu
column6: na emi na musuar koraa wɔ m’egya fie."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see no dɛ
column3: Ampa mibedzi w’ekyir
column4: na iboku Midianfo dɛ nyimpa baako."

column2: "Na Gideon see no dɛ
column3: Sɛ afei menya w’enyim enyimnyam a
column4: ɔno kyerɛ me asɛnkyerɛdze dɛ ɔwoara na enye me rekasa yi."

column2: "Meserɛ wo
column3: mma mmfi ha nnkɔ
column4: ma membra wo nkyɛn
column5: memfa m’ayɛyɛdze mbɔto w’enyim ana. Na ɔsee dɛ
column6: Mibetsintsim araa ma asan aba ana."

column2: "Na Gideon kɔree
column3: na okesiesiee apɔnkyeba
column4: na isiam efa kor n’epitsi tatar: enam no ɔdze too kɛntsɛn mu
column5: na ohuee nkwan no guu nkwansɛn no mu
column6: na ɔdze fiir edzi baa ne nkyɛn wɔ osudur no ase

column2: "Na Nyame no bɔfoe no see no dɛ
column3: Fa nam no na epitsi tatar no
column4: na fa gu ɔbotan yi do
column5: na hue nkwan no gu. Na ɔyɛɛ dɛm."

column2: "Nna EWURADZE no bɔfoe no tseen poma a ɔdze ne nsamu no n’ano
column3: na ɔdze kaa nam no na epitsi tatar no; na ogya fi ɔbotan no mu puei
column4: na ɔbɛhyeew nam na epitsi tatar no; na EWURADZE no bɔfoe no fi n’enyi do kɔree."

column2: "Na Gideon hun dɛ ɔyɛ EWURADZE no bɔfoe; na Gideon tseaa mu dɛ
column3: Ao
column4: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn! Afei mehu EWURADZE no bɔfoe enyim na enyim."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see no dɛ
column3: Asomdwee nka wo; mma nnsuro: innkowu bi."

column2: "Nna Gideon sii afɔrmbukyia wɔ hɔ maa EWURADZE
column3: na ɔfrɛɛ no YHWH-salom a ase nye EWURADZE nye Asomdwee: na ɔda ho ara wɔ Abiezerfo Ofra dze bodu ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ anadwe no ara
column3: EWURADZE see no dɛ
column4: Fa w’egya ne nantwisaa no
column5: mekyerɛ ɔnantwisaa a otsia ebien a oedzi mfe esuon no
column6: na kodwuruw Baal n’afɔrmbukyia a w’egya wɔ no
column7: na twa Asera a osi ho no kyen:"

column2: "na si afɔrmbukyia ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn wɔ guansumabew yi etsifi
column3: wɔ ne kyenan do
column4: na fa ɔnantwisaa a otsia ebien no
column5: na fa ka Asera a itwae no ne nyena no ho bɔ ɔhyew afɔr."

column2: "Nna Gideon faa no nkowaa mu mbarimba du
column3: na ɔyɛɛ hɔn dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ no no: na osiandɛ osuroo n’egya fifo
column4: na ekuromfo no ntsi ma oenntum annyɛ no ewia no
column5: nna ɔyɛɛ no anadwe."

column2: "Na aber a ekuromfo no soɛɛr anapaatu no
column3: hwɛ
column4: Baal n’afɔrmbukyia no woedwuruw
column5: na Asera a osi ho no woetwa akyen
column6: na ɔnantwisaa a otsia ebien no wɔdze abɔ afɔr wɔ afɔrmbukyia a woesi no do."

column2: "Na wobisaa hɔnho nkorkor dɛ
column3: Woana na ɔyɛɛ dɛm adze yi? Na aber a wɔhwehwɛe na wobisabisae no
column4: wɔsee dɛ
column5: Joas ne babanyin Gideon na ɔyɛɛ dɛm adze yi."

column2: "Na ekuromfo no see Joas dɛ
column3: Yi wo ba no bra
column4: ma ombowu; osiandɛ oedwuruw Baal n’afɔrmbukyia
column5: na oetwa Asera a osi ho no akyen."

column2: "Nna Joas buaa hɔn a wogyinagyina no do no nyinara dɛ
column3: Ana hom na woribedzi Baal n’asɛm ama no anaa? Anaa hom na wɔrebɛgye no? Nyia obedzi n’asɛm ama no no
column4: wɔmma wonku no anapa yi ara: sɛ ɔyɛ nyame a
column5: wɔmma ondzi noara n’asɛm

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ɔfrɛɛ no Jerubaal da no ara
column3: dɛ
column4: Wɔmma Baal ndzi ntsia no
column5: dɛ oedwuruw n’afɔrmbukyia ntsi."

column2: "Nna Midianfo na Amalekfo na boka afamu mba no nyinara poon hɔnho hyiae; na wotwae
column3: na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Jezreel ɔbɔn mu."

column2: "Na EWURADZE no sunsum baa Gideon do; na ɔhɛɛn abɛn; na Abiezer boaa ano kedzii n’ekyir."
"Na ɔsomaa abɔfo ma wɔkɔr Manaasɛ nyinara; na hɔn so wɔboaa ano kedzii n’ekyir: na ɔsomaa abɔfo ma wɔkɔr Aser
column3: na Zebulun
column4: na Naftali hɔ; na wɔfowee bae behyiaa no."

column2: "Na Gideon see Nyankopɔn dɛ
column3: Sɛ enam me nsa do bɛgye Israel nkwa dɛ mbrɛ aka no a
column5: "hwɛ
column6: medze oguannhwi mebɛhata ewuporoweebea; sɛ ɔbɔsu tɔ gu oguannhwi no nko do
column7: na famu hɔ yɛ wesee a
column8: ɔno na mubohu dɛ ɔwo enam me nsa do ebɛgye Israel nkwa dɛ mbrɛ aka no."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dɛm: osiandɛ n’adzekyee no ɔsoɛɛr anapaatu
column3: na ɔkaa nguannhwi no bɔɔ mu miae
column4: na okyii ɔbɔsu no wɔ oguannhwi no mu
column5: nsukora ma."

column2: "Na Gideon see Nyankopɔn dɛ
column3: Mma w’ebufuw nndzɛw mo do
column4: na mebɛkasa prɛko yi ara bio: Meserɛ wo
column5: ma memfa oguannhwi no monsɔ monhwɛ prɛko yi ara bio; afei ma oguannhwi no nko no do nyɛ wesee
column6: na ɔbɔsu no ntɔ ngu famu hɔ nyinara."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn yɛɛ dɛm anadwe no; na oguannhwi no nko no do yɛɛ wesee
column3: na ɔbɔsu tɔree guu famu hɔ nyinara."
